title: The Elder's Book of Uncommon Wisdom
content:
The Elder’s Book of Uncommon Wisdom is an optional, variant mode of play for Earthborne Rangers that replaces a small selection of Ranger cards with alternate versions of those cards. Some have been changed significantly and are very different from their “standard” counterparts. Others are almost identical to the original cards and feature only minor modifications like the addition of a new trait.

If you play using the Elder’s Book of Uncommon Wisdom, you must do so in full. You cannot pick and choose which alternate cards to use and which to not.

Cards in the Elder's Book of Uncommon Wisdom can be identified by this book icon on the lower-right hand corner of the card:

For clarifications and error fixes, see Card Errata.

Navigating the Elder's Book of Uncommon Wisdom

There are a few different ways to navigate this section:

Navigation Bar: You can look up cards by name using the navigation bar at the left-hand side of the screen.

Search: You can access a search function by clicking on the magnifying glass in the upper-right corner of the screen.

PDF: Below is a link to a PDF containing all of the updated cards. You can use this PDF to view or print out the updated cards.
